subproject.corporate outcome: Local and national authorities have the capacities to access and integrate multiple sources of public and private environmental financing in support of sustainable human development, including gender equality and poverty reduction
subproject.description: This project assists Ethiopia, Kenya,Tanzania,Mauritius,Zambia & Mozambique to create an ‘operational Clean Development Mechanisms framework’ -an environment in which public institutions are able to effectively interact with the private sector to jointly develop Clean Development Mechanism projects.
subproject.title: CDM Capacity Building - TZA
